- [Information (Technology), Market Performance, and Welfare in the South Indian Fisheries Sector](https://www.jstor.org/stable/25098864)
    - TLDR: Three different regions of Kerala encountered phone adotpion at different times. Each region saw adoption go from 0% to 60% within ~10 weeks. The effects on the fishing market were crystal clear and significant. Fish price volatility dropped by magnitudes, displaying the enablement of information transfer.
